verses.verse: הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold יֽוֹם־ <WH3117> yom- Behold the day בָּ֖א <WH935> ba cometh לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְחֻלַּ֥ק <WH2505> ve-chul-Lak shall be divided שְׁלָלֵ֖ךְ <WH7998> she-la-Lech and thy spoil בְּקִרְבֵּֽךְ׃ <WH7130> be-kir-Bech. in the midst
